name: CodePath CCSF Demo Day
body:
###Event Agenda
* 6:30pm – 7:00pm – Arrival and Networking
* 7:00pm – 7:15pm – Intro
* 7:15pm – 8:15pm – Demo Presentations
* 8:15pm – 8:30pm – Judges Deliberation
* 8:30pm – 9:00pm – Awards, Networking

### App Name:	[Japanize](https://github.com/ccsf-japanese/japanize)
Team:		Alejandro Sanchez Acosta, Dylan James Smith, Tom Horvath, Xinxin Xie

Tired of wasting your time while learning a new language? Japanize is an addictive Kanji drawing app that lets you practice your Japanese through various fun and games while tracking your progress through a collegiate level vocabulary.


### App Name:	[Venatus](https://github.com/BCD-APP)
Team:		Brian Bailey, Douglas Li

Venatus is a Media Sharing Platform where Gamers come to create and share their favorite Moments. After creating your profile, you can add Games to your account such as League of Legends or Counter Strike!

* Share your big plays from Plays.TV with friends
* Create Gaming Events such as LAN’s
* Streams from Twitch.TV
* Chat with your friends
* Tournament Brackets
* Game Queues

Come and share your favorite Gaming Moments with all your friends!

###App Name:	[Shakeel](https://github.com/tmmk)

Cracked your screen?  Laptop running slow?  There’s an app for that.

* enter your problem and find out instantly: if your manufacturer warranty can resolve the problem free of charge or get a price quote for a repair
* pick a return ETA
* generate a shipping label, and
* drop off at your nearest shipping location anywhere in the U.S.

Shakeel the SF Repair Guy is family-owned and operated since 2008, with over 500 5-star Yelp reviews. Always the best price and only OEM original manufacturer parts.

###App Name:	[SF Art Openings](https://github.com/Codepath-Juan-Yousef-Chris)
Team:		Christopher Soria, Juan Hernandez, Yousef Kazerooni

Have you ever yearned for a stimulating experience after a long day at work? There are many websites offering you listings of events in the city, showing you rows after rows of events. But it is overwhelming to go through them in search of the best experience. SF Art Openings is our solution for you: Because what can be more engaging than an art opening, where you can connect with interesting people in a creative setting, have drinks, and an amazing night with the artist as your host!

SF Art Openings gives users the convenience of finding art receptions in the city and get to them within just a few taps. Want more information before you decide? You can find detailed information about an event and use the map feature to get there, or choose from one of your favorite car share services. Once at the gallery, SF Art Opening allows you to jump into the conversation right off the bat, with a bulletin board-like chat function. Start connecting with people and have a splendid evening with SF Art Openings!

###App Name:	[Tesdrop](https://github.com/tesDrop/tesDrop)
Team:		Carlos Osco Huaricapcha, Ka Kin “Ken” Chiu, Zhipeng “Adrian” Mei

Tesdrop allows users to share past exams. Along your academic career, you had faced the struggle of preparing for test. Either you studied too much, or didn’t study enough. We are revolutionizing test preparation so users will be ready for their upcoming test. Not only you will be able to see a past exam, but also talk about it with your peers. All information at your fingertips.

###App Name:	[Foto](https://github.com/VeMoJa/iStream)
Team:		Jasmine Farrell, Manthan “Monte” Thakkar, Veronika Kotckovich

Foto allows users to save memorable and eventful moments as animated videos. These videos can be streamed onto several social sites including Twitter, Facebook, and Google+. The video feature makes sharing these moments among family and friends engaging, exciting, and entertaining, especially with our new emojis that you can drag around, scale and rotate as you like. Once you’re done you can paste them onto your memorable pictures.

Our app uses several third party libraries to achieve its awesome design:
* Parse
* Onboard (a framework for beautiful onboard experiences)
* RESideMenu (a style side menu with parallax effect inspired by Dribbble shots)
* RAReorderableLayout (a UICollectionView photo layout with an interactive drag-and-drop)
* UIColor-Hex-Swift (create autoreleased color using a RGBA hex string)
* AVFoundation (customizable camera effects)


###App Name:	[Adnable](https://github.com/ristau/cp-adnable)
Team:		Barbara Ristau, Jean Henrique Menezes, Oranuch Tangdechavut, Sarn Wattanasri

Adnable is a mobile application that connects authentic fans with the brands they love.  Our app provides a one-stop tool for making ad creatives from the moment that the fans have great experience to real and lively ads.  We provide enjoyable ways for creating ads by customizing photos, making comments, sharing digital creatives through social media, and requesting ride sharing services.  Our users receive special rewards as they made effort to advocate for the brands and businesses.  Marketers can realize untapped potential to access core fans, utilize awesome ads in a cost-effective fashion, and explore the collective imagination of their audience.

###App Name:	[Vector](https://github.com/WayZimChu/vector)
Team:		David Wayman, Eric Chu, Eric Zimmerman

Need to try a new food spot, bar or café? Vector is a simple, intuitive app that allows you and a friend to find a meeting spot exactly at the midpoint between your locations. Wherever the midpoint is calculated, icons pop up on a map near the midpoint, allowing you to choose the type of meeting place, such as a bar, café, bakery, restaurant, or supermarket. Use the convenience of meeting your friend somewhere in the middle with Vector.

***
Created by [Xinxin Xie](https://github.com/xinxinxie)
